thought1: Have kindness in others' troubles and courage in your own.
thought2: Education is a progressive discovery of your ignorance.
thought3: A good beginning makes a good ending.
thought4: Education is a state-controlled manufactory of echoes.
thought5: A tree is known by its fruit.
thought6: All learning is in the learner, not in the teacher.
thought7: A flow of words is no proof of wisdom.
thought8: Be slow to promise, but quick to perform.
thought9: Education is the movement from darkness to light.
thought10: It matters not how a man dies, but how he lives.
thought11: Education costs money, but then so does ignorance.
thought12: Learn to walk before you run.
thought13: Education is a vaccine for violence.
thought14: The frog in the well knows nothing of the great ocean.
thought15: I never learned from a man who agreed with me.
thought16: Success is a journey, not a destination.
thought17: If you wish to reach the highest, begin at the lowest.
thought18: Kites rise against, not with the wind.
thought19: If you can dream it, you can do it.
thought20: Always look at the rose, ignore the thorn.
thought21: Education is the art of making man ethical.
thought22: Follow no one but learn from everyone.
thought23: Better light a candle than curse darkness.
thought24: You cannot be anything if you want to be everything.
thought25: Genius is nothing but continued attention.
thought26: Brave action never wants a trumpet.
thought27: You can't tell a book by its cover.
thought28: More doors are opened with 'please' than with keys.
thought30: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.
thought32: The pen is the tongue of the mind.
thought33: Our actions are thoughts made visible.
thought35: Prayer is the perfume of the soul.
thought36: Education has only commas, not full stops.
thought38: Jealousy is the jaundice of the soul.
thought39: Don't let yesterday use up too much of today.
thought40: Men use common words to say uncommon things.
thought41: It is with acts and not by ideas that people live.
thought42: Speech is the index of the mind.
thought43: Learning without thought is labour lost.
thought44: To be good is noble, but to teach others is nobler.
thought45: Individuality is the basis of distinction.
thought46: They know enough who know how to learn.
thought47: To regret deeply is to live afresh.
thought48: A smile cost less than electricity and gives more light.
thought49: Idleness is the root of all evil and failure.
thought50: Education is a progressive discovery of our ignorance.
thought51: A good beginning makes a good ending.
thought53: Life without industry is guilt, industry without art is brutality.
thought54: Plan your work and work your plan.
thought55: A thing of beauty is a joy for ever.
thought56: Fame is the perfume of heroic deed.
thought57: A little learning is a dangerous thing.
thought58: If winter comes, can spring be far behind?
thought59: Luck is great, but most of life is hard work.
thought60: All things are possible because anything can be learned.
thought61: Never stop learning. Never stop growing.
thought62: Change is the end result of all true learning.
thought63: The more you learn, the more you earn.
thought64: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
thought66: Honesty prospers in every condition of life.
thought67: A learning curve is essential to growth.
thought68: Education is the ability to meet life's situations.
thought69: Every artist was at first an amateur.
thought70: Happiness is the real sense of fulfillment that comes from hard work.
thought71: A good education is a foundation for a better future.
thought72: When you learn, teach. When you get, give.
thought73: School is the path, not the point.
thought74: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
thought75: Knowledge is a treasure, but practice is the key to it.
